generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with tram tracks running down the center, marked lanes, and vehicles driving on it.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and lined with buildings and poles.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures with visible windows, balconies, and signs.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and street lights.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are present, including directional signs and no-parking signs, mounted on poles.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast with some clouds.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the street.
- car: Multiple cars are visible, including a dark-colored sedan in the foreground and a black car parked on the right side of the street.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the right side of the street, near the curb.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the sidewalk on the left side of the street, near the person walking.
- truck: A white van is parked on the right side of the street, which can be classified as a truck.
